name: rss-chan
description: A telegram RSS feed reader bot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The Telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram User ID of the Bot Owner.

CHAT_ID.description: The chat ID where you want your feeds to be dumped.

DELAY.description: The delay between each feed request. Set to 600s (10 mins) by default.

INIT_FEEDS.description: To prevent feed spam on redeploy.

CUSTOM_MESSAGES.description: To display a custom message at the top of every new feed.
